function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in virus quanta emission rate","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of quanta concentration in the building","Mitigation":"Regular measurement of emission rate and adjusting the model accordingly","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, particle counters","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Assumptions about virus settlement and inactivation rates","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of virus concentration and infection risk","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to determine accurate settlement and inactivation rates","Technologies":"Laboratory testing, environmental monitoring equipment","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccuracy in estimating virus infection risk","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission among non-infected people","Mitigation":"Regular review and update of infection risk calculation model based on real-world data","Technologies":"Epidemiological data analysis tools, simulation software","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"}]}
